import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import api from '../services/api'; export default function Dashboard() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [role, setRole] = useState(''); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ ngos: 0, campaigns: 0, donations: 0 }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { // Decode JWT to get user info const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); if (token) { try { const payload = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1])); setRole(payload.role); setUser(payload); } catch (err) { console.error('Failed to decode token'); } } setLoading(false); }, []); if (loading) return
Loading...
